long_description: The 2-person Therm-a-Rest Vela(TM) Down Blanket redefines the level of comfort to be had while camping and backpacking. Pair it with 2 sleeping pads (sold separately) for a night of sound sleep. Durable nylon shell features 650-fill-power down insulation; box-baffle construction keeps down from shifting around, so cold spots are prevented. Down insulation delivers an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; it's one of the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulations available. Vela Blanket is rated to keep you warm down to about 40degF, making it suitable for warm-weather 3-season outings. Pair the blanket up with 2 large Therm-a-Rest NeoAir Dream Sleeping Pads (sold separately) for excellent warmth and comfort while car camping. Also works well with any 2 pads with a combined width of 50 in.; choose lightweight pads for backpacking. Draft tubes and elasticized foot box create a seal around your mattress that keeps drafts at bay. Side snaps and the included Loop Kit allow you to attach the blanket directly to any mattress or another Therm-a-Rest blanket for the ultimate slumber party. Therm-a-Rest Vela Down Blanket includes a stuff sack.
